title: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline

reasoning.problem: The recent influx of PDF documents highlights the urgent need for a formal inbox document processing pipeline. This pipeline should include automated extraction of key information (author, title, subject matter, key terms), indexing for efficient retrieval, and storage within AgentLibrarian's long-term memory archive (The Canon). This will enhance the Republic's knowledge base and strategic capabilities, facilitating informed decision-making and preventing information overload.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
